# Code of Conduct

## Our Commitment

We are committed to providing a welcoming and inclusive environment for all contributors and users. We expect everyone participating in this community to treat each other with respect, regardless of background, experience level, or any other characteristic.

## Expected Behavior

- Be respectful and constructive in communication
- Welcome diverse perspectives and experiences
- Assume good intent when interpreting others' words
- Provide and accept constructive feedback gracefully
- Focus on what is best for the community

## Unacceptable Behavior

- Harassment, discrimination, or intimidation in any form
- Offensive comments related to personal characteristics
- Deliberate disruption of discussions or community
- Publishing others' private information without consent
- Any conduct that violates the law

## Reporting Issues

If you witness or experience behavior that violates this code, please report it by:

1. Emailing: conduct@vnykmshr.com
2. Or contacting a project maintainer directly

All reports will be treated confidentially. We are committed to taking appropriate action.

## Scope

This code of conduct applies to all interactions in the Engineering Playbook community, including GitHub issues, discussions, pull requests, and related communication channels.

---

Based on the [Contributor Covenant](https://www.contributor-covenant.org/) v2.1
